import React from 'react' import { IoAirplaneSharp } from 'react-icons/io5' import { FlightInfo } from '../../models/FlightInfo' type FlightInfoProps = { flightInfo: FlightInfo } const InfoFlight: React.FC = ({ flightInfo }) => { return (
{ !flightInfo || !flightInfo.flight || !flightInfo.flight.live ?
Không thể lấy được thông tin chuyến bay
:
6h 27m elapsed
{flightInfo.dflownNumber}
5h 55m remaining
{flightInfo.dtoGoNumber}
}
) } export default InfoFlight
